# Benchmarking Results

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
v1_1_1_0_1_t1 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v1.1_0_1_omp_t1.csv")
v1_1_1_0_1_t8 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v1.1_0_1_omp_t8.csv")
v1_1_1_0_1_t16 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v1.1_0_1_omp_t16.csv")

v1_2_1_0_1_t1 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v1.2_0_1_omp_t1.csv")
v1_2_1_0_1_t8 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v1.2_0_1_omp_t8.csv")
v1_2_1_0_1_t16 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v1.2_0_1_omp_t16.csv")

v2_0_1_0_1_t1 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2_0_1_omp_t1.csv")
v2_0_1_0_1_t8 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2_0_1_omp_t8.csv")
v2_0_1_0_1_t16 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2_0_1_omp_t16.csv")

v2_1_1_0_1_t1 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2.1_0_1_omp_t1.csv")
v2_1_1_0_1_t8 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2.1_0_1_omp_t8.csv")
v2_1_1_0_1_t16 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2.1_0_1_omp_t16.csv")

v2_2_1_0_1_t1 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2.2_0_1_omp_t1.csv")
v2_2_1_0_1_t8 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2.2_0_1_omp_t8.csv")
v2_2_1_0_1_t16 <- read.csv("benchmarks/v2.2_0_1_omp_t16.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(v1_1_1_0_1_t1)
summary(v1_1_1_0_1_t8)
summary(v1_1_1_0_1_t16)

summary(v1_2_1_0_1_t1)
summary(v1_2_1_0_1_t8)
summary(v1_2_1_0_1_t16)

summary(v2_0_1_0_1_t1)
summary(v2_0_1_0_1_t8)
summary(v2_0_1_0_1_t16)

summary(v2_1_1_0_1_t1)

summary(v2_1_1_0_1_t16)

summary(v2_2_1_0_1_t1)
summary(v2_2_1_0_1_t8)
summary(v2_2_1_0_1_t16)
```

```{r}
boxplot(v1_1_1_0_1_t1,

)

boxplot(v1_1_1_0_1_t8,

)

boxplot(v1_1_1_0_1_t16,
  main = "v1.1 - 16 thread"
)
```
